metadata.title: Welcome to Our Sushi Haven
metadata.description: Discover an unforgettable dining experience, crafted with love and sustainability in mind. Enjoy the finest sushi in Genève, Switzerland.

componentTwo.title: With Love
componentTwo.text: We are passionate about providing a sustainable and unforgettable dining experience, serving locally sourced dishes that reflect the essence of our community.

componentThree.title: Our Journey
componentThree.text: From a passion for homemade sushi to a beloved local eatery, we’ve become a second home for sushi enthusiasts across the region.

metadata.title: Explore Our Menu
metadata.description: Browse our menu and savor the best of our sushi creations, crafted with fresh ingredients and a touch of local love.

metadata.title: Our Story
metadata.description: Learn about the roots of our sushi passion and how we’ve grown into a beloved dining spot in Genève, bringing together tradition and innovation.

componentSeven.title: Experience
componentSeven.caption: Patient
componentSeven.text: Our goal is to offer a one-of-a-kind, sustainable dining experience that leaves a lasting impression, serving dishes crafted from locally sourced ingredients.

componentEight.title: 25 Years
componentEight.text: For 25 years, we’ve been perfecting our craft, offering a memorable dining experience for sushi lovers and the local community.

metadata.title: Reserve a Table
metadata.description: Book a table with us today to experience the finest sushi and an unforgettable dining atmosphere in the heart of Genève.

componentNine.title: Reserve Your Table
componentNine.text: Secure your spot and enjoy our sustainable sushi crafted with love. We can't wait to welcome you!

metadata.title: Error - Something Went Wrong
metadata.description: It seems like something went wrong. The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist or has been moved. Let’s get you back to the homepage.

errorPage.errorDescription: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist or has been moved. Please return to the homepage and continue exploring.

metadata.title: 404 - Page Not Found
metadata.description: The page you’re looking for could not be found. Return to our homepage to discover the best sushi in Genève.

notFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
notFoundPage.description: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist or has been moved. Let's get you back to the homepage.
